ComicInfo.Title: Dead Like Me, Part 3 of 4: "Hello," He Lied
ComicInfo.Summary: Dead Like Me, Part 3 of 4: "Hello," He Lied: Samson and Banner discuss the possibility of curing Betty's cancer with a transfusion of Bruce's blood. They also decide that the Banner clone should be killed, but while everyone hesitates, the clone changes into the Hulk and the two monsters face off.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 01:29:27. [CVDB99132] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:57:57. [Issue ID 219410]

ComicInfo.Characters: Doc Samson [Leonard Samson],Mr. Blue [Betty Ross],Hulk [Bruce Banner],Nadia Blonsky,Hulk [Bruce Banner clone]
